hero.title: Events and Activities
hero.subtitle: Enjoy the most beautiful cultural, entertainment, and adventure events in the heart of the Arabian Gulf. Choose your perfect experience and book now!

shoppingFestival.title: Shopping Festival
shoppingFestival.description: Enjoy the biggest shopping festival in the region with exclusive offers and discounts on the best international brands.

heritageTour.title: Nabataean Heritage Tour
heritageTour.description: An exploratory trip to Madain Saleh and ancient Nabataean monuments with specialized guides in history and archaeology.

desertNight.title: Starry Night in the Desert
desertNight.description: A unique camping experience under the stars with traditional dinner and authentic Bedouin artistic performances.

diving.title: Diving Trips
diving.description: Discover the beauty of marine life in the depths of the Sea of Oman with professional trainers and modern equipment.

craftsMarket.title: Handicrafts Market
craftsMarket.description: Exhibition of traditional handicrafts and folk arts with interactive workshops for visitors.

marathon.title: Desert Marathon
marathon.description: Marathon race in the heart of the desert with various tracks for professionals and amateurs.
